room_title: Escape room "The Theater" by Escape the Room Texas in Houston
review: The room had good elements and was ok.  Not one of my favorite rooms although it had some good technology. For me I wish the puzzles madr more sense.  We will try other rooms here and give them another shot.

room_title: Escape room "The Theater" by Escape the Room Texas in Houston
review: We did the Theater room and loved it. We got enough clues to help and we finished in time!

room_title: Escape room "The Theater" by Escape the Room Texas in Houston
review: Really had fun and enjoyed the Theater! We will definitely be back to do the other rooms. The first time we went it was hard to find. It is on the second floor of a courtyard.

room_title: Escape room "The Theater" by Escape the Room Texas in Houston
review: The Theater was fun. I was no help to get us out but we made it in 53:00.We went for my daughter's birthday and she loved it. Good for families and team building.

room_title: Escape room "The Theater" by Escape the Room Texas in Houston
review: Had fun at Escape the Room. Had 3 people in my group and we were joined by 5 others. We attempted The Theatre room which was cool. Trying to get out of the room was a fun experience, but expensive as it's $30/person. We DID escape the room!

room_title: Escape room "The Theater" by Escape the Room Texas in Houston
review: Super fun. We will be back! It was well done. Escape the Theater this time, can't wait to see what is next.
